title: "validationConfig_publication"

Validation of REMIND scenarios as used in

> Weigmann, P., Mandaroux, R., Lécuyer, F., Merfort, A., Dorndorf, T., Hoppe, J., Müßel, J., Pietzcker, R., Richters, O., Baumstark, L., Kriegler, E., Bauer, N., Benke, F., Gong, C. C., and Luderer, G.: Validation of climate mitigation pathways, EGUsphere [preprint], https://doi.org/10.5194/egusphere-2025-2284, 2025. 

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(DT)

# Load the CSV from inst/config
df <- piamValidation::getConfig("publication")

font.size <- "9pt"

df %>%
   DT::datatable(
     options = list(
       pageLength = 100,
       initComplete = htmlwidgets::JS(
          "function(settings, json) {",
          paste0("$(this.api().table().container()).css({'font-size': '", font.size, "'});"),
          "}"),
      filter = 'top'  # This enables the column filters
      )
    )

```
